name: case-track
description: Mental Health Therapist Case Tracking System

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build && mkdir -p deploy/case-track && cp -r backend/dist deploy/case-track/backend/ && cp -r frontend/dist deploy/case-track/frontend/ && cp -r database deploy/case-track/ && cp -r templates deploy/case-track/ && cp package.json deploy/case-track/ && cp LICENSE deploy/case-track/ && cp README.md deploy/case-track/
scripts.deploy:package: npm run deploy:build && cd deploy && tar -czf case-track-$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 || echo latest).tar.gz case-track/
scripts.deploy:github: npm run deploy:package && echo 'Ready to upload to GitHub releases'
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../backend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf deploy/ && rm -rf frontend/dist/ && rm -rf backend/dist/

author: Tyler
